Package org.treetank.cache

Implementation for the caches.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ICache Interface for all upcoming cache implementations.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPersistenceCache Abstract class for holding all persistence caches.
BerkeleyPersistenceCache Berkeley implementation of a persistent cache.
LRUCache An LRU cache, based on LinkedHashMap.
NodePageContainer NodePageContainer
NodePageContainerBinding  
NullCache Null cache, just for perfomance measurements.
TransactionLogCache Transactionlog for storing all upcoming nodes in either the ram cache or a persistent second cache.
 

Package org.treetank.cache Description

Implementation for the caches. The caches can either be ICache instances or AbstractPersistentCache instances.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
